Address.label: Address
Address.value: AVENIDA PROFESSOR MAGALHAES NETO 1752,10TH FLOOR, ROOMS 1010 AND 1011, SALVADOR, 41810-011, Brazil

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Suzano SA produces and sells pulp and a variety of paper products. The company organizes itself into two segments based on product type: Pulp and Paper. The Pulp segment generates the majority of revenue. The firm's product portfolio includes printing and writing paper, paperboard, diapers, and sanitary napkins. The company owns forest land and plants in Brazil, where it harvests timber and turns the timber into pulp and paper in its plants. More revenue comes from Brazil than any other geographic area.
